"use client";

import { useState } from 'react';
import { FaBoxOpen, FaTags, FaStream, FaCheckCircle } from 'react-icons/fa';

// Import all the management pages
import CategoriesPage from './categories/page';
import LeadSourcePage from './lead-source/page';
import LeadStatusPage from './lead-status/page';
import ProductsPage from './products/page';

export default function ManageItemPage() {
  const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('products');

  const tabs = [
    { id: 'products', label: 'Products', icon: FaBoxOpen, component: ProductsPage },
    { id: 'categories', label: 'Categories', icon: FaTags, component: CategoriesPage },
    { id: 'lead-source', label: 'Lead Source', icon: FaStream, component: LeadSourcePage },
    { id: 'lead-status', label: 'Lead Status', icon: FaCheckCircle, component: LeadStatusPage },
  ];

  const ActiveComponent = tabs.find(tab => tab.id === activeTab)?.component || ProductsPage;

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-[#f9f9f9]">
      <style>{`*{scrollbar-width:none!important;-ms-overflow-style:none!important}*::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none!important}`}</style>
      
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200 sticky top-0 z-40 shadow-sm">
        <div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 py-4">
          <h1 className="text-2xl sm:text-3xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-4">Manage Items</h1>
          
          {/* Desktop Tabs */}
          <div className="hidden md:flex space-x-1 bg-gray-100 p-1 rounded-lg">
            {tabs.map(tab => {
              const Icon = tab.icon;
              return (
                <button
                  key={tab.id}
                  onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
                  className={`flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-3 rounded-md font-medium transition-all duration-200 flex-1 justify-center ${
                    activeTab === tab.id
                      ? 'bg-blue-900 text-white shadow-md'
                      : 'text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-200'
                  }`}
                >
                  <Icon className="w-4 h-4" />
                  <span>{tab.label}</span>
                </button>
              );
            })}
          </div>

          {/* Mobile Tabs */}
          <div className="md:hidden">
            <div className="grid grid-cols-2 gap-2">
              {tabs.map(tab => {
                const Icon = tab.icon;
                return (
                  <button
                    key={tab.id}
                    onClick={() => setActiveTab(tab.id)}
                    className={`flex items-center justify-center gap-2 px-4 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium transition-all duration-200 ${
                      activeTab === tab.id
                        ? 'bg-blue-900 text-white shadow-md'
                        : 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-200'
                    }`}
                  >
                    <Icon className="w-4 h-4" />
                    <span className="text-sm">{tab.label}</span>
                  </button>
                );
              })}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Content Area */}
      <div className="w-full">
        <ActiveComponent />
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
